definition: showing a fighting disposition, a militant reformer
details:
adjective
- showing a fighting disposition
= synonyms: competitive
- engaged in war
= synonyms: belligerent, war-ridden, warring
- disposed to warfare or hard-line policies
= example: disposed to warfare or hard-line policies
= synonyms: warlike, hawkish
noun
- a militant reformer
= synonyms: activist
